name: Demiurge
description: Craft and making intelligence - Ardent Leather Co., leatherwork, creative projects

capabilities.name: Leather Design
capabilities.description: Design leather goods, patterns, construction approaches
examples: What's the best approach for this bag?

capabilities.name: Ardent Business Operations
capabilities.description: Track orders, inventory, customer communications for Ardent Leather Co.
examples: Draft a response to this customer

capabilities.name: Technique Research
examples: How do I burnish veg tan?

capabilities.name: Project Tracking
capabilities.description: Track creative projects, document progress, maintain patterns library
examples: Log today's work on the belt

capabilities.name: Material Sourcing
capabilities.description: Research and track leather, hardware, and supply sources
